2-3 (API): The only explicit API-related information provided states the list of values that are accepted in the model_name parameter. According to the quote, callers can specify either “hunyuanimage-v2.1” or its variant “hunyuanimage-v2.1-distilled,” confirming that these two identifiers are officially supported for remote inference or generation requests against the HunyuanImage service.
3-1 (Pre-training): HunyuanImage-2.1 is introduced as a highly efficient text-to-image model capable of producing images at 2 K resolution (2048 × 2048). Its pre-training leverages an extensive dataset coupled with structured captions that are generated with the assistance of multiple expert models. This combination is reported to substantially improve the alignment between textual prompts and generated images, indicating that careful data curation and multi-model captioning strategies underpin the system’s overall performance.

3-1 (Pre-training)__evidence.quote: We present HunyuanImage-2.1, a highly efficient text-to-image model that is capable of generating 2K (2048 × 2048) resolution images. Leveraging an extensive dataset and structured captions involving multiple expert models, we significantly enhance text-image alignment capabilities.
